SELECT reserve_no, m_id, m.m_name, b_name, to_char(reserve_date, 'YYYY/MM/DD HH24:MM') reserve_date, m.m_no m_no, b.b_no b_no FROM reservation_book r, member m, book b WHERE m_isshow = 'Y' AND reserve_isshow = 'Y' AND r.m_no = m.m_no AND r.b_no = b.b_no ORDER BY reserve_date, b_name
mapper.update: UPDATE reservation_book SET reserve_isshow = 'N' WHERE reserve_no = #{reserve_no}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO RENT(RENT_NO,M_NO,B_NO) VALUES((SELECT NVL(MAX(RENT_NO),0)+1 FROM RENT),#{m_no},#{b_no})
mapper.select: SELECT r.rent_no, m.m_id, m.m_name, b_name, rent_date, NVL(extend_count,0) extend_count, (rent_date + (NVL(extend_count,0)+1)*7) return_date, ceil(sysdate - (rent_date + (NVL(extend_count,0)+1)*7)) overdue_day FROM rent r INNER JOIN member m ON r.m_no = m.m_no INNER JOIN book b ON r.b_no = b.b_no LEFT OUTER JOIN extend e ON e.rent_no = r.rent_no LEFT OUTER JOIN return re ON re.rent_no = r.rent_no WHERE m_isshow = 'Y' AND rent_isshow = 'Y' ORDER BY rent_date
mapper.update: UPDATE rent SET rent_isshow = 'N' WHERE rent_no = #{rent_no}
mapper.insert: insert into RETURN(return_no, rent_no, return_date, m_no) values((SELECT NVL(MAX(return_no),0)+1 FROM RETURN),#{rent_no},sysdate, (select m_no from rent where rent_no = #{rent_no}))
